column5: Booked a week down there mid January. Anybody know of any shore fishing around there or if off shore charters are worth it? Thanks

There is the beach,  we tried it and got nothing, waded way out and still nothing. I got a bunch of small guys hand  lining. Across the street on the water break across the highway. It was fun but they were small fish. There is a public dick that is incredibly slippery and I got another unknown fish
There was this puffer that was the highlight
Public dicks can be pretty slippery, be safe!   lol
Thanks for the info Hoping to stay away from public dicks ?
Varadero, not the place to go to try fishing down south. Protein is at a premium in Cuba...all fish caught are consumed by locals.
